p: Sulfuric acid (10 mL, 6 mol/L) was added into a three-necked flask, and then cooled to 0 °C to remove oxygen. After that, DPNA (0.518 g, 2 mmol) was added with stirring at 0 °C for 0.5 h. Subsequently, NaNO 2 (0.207 g, 3 mmol) and NaN 3 (0.195 g, 3 mmol) aqueous solutions with a concentration of 1 mol/L were slowly added with stirring at 0 °C for 3 h. Then, the intermediate (DPNN 3) was extracted by 30 mL of dichloromethane, and washed by saturated salt water to remove impurities. The yield of the product was about 72% (0.411 g). IR (KBr, v, cm −1): 2127 (R-N=N=N stretching), 1509 (−NO 2 stretching), 1347 (C−N stretching), 1100~700 (Ar–H stretching). 1H NMR (400 MHz, DMSO- d 6, δ, ppm): 8.33 (d, J = 8.7 Hz, 2H), 8.16 (s, 1H), 8.14 – 8.06 (m, 1H), 7.83 (d, J = 8.7 Hz, 2H), 7.73 (d, J = 8.4 Hz, 1H). 13C NMR (100 MHz, DMSO- d 6, δ, ppm): 148.51, 147.77, 142.87, 139.20, 136.83, 132.65, 131.29, 123.86, 120.25, 115.22. MS (EI, m/ z): 285(10) ([M +], calcd for C 12H 7N 5O 4, 285.05). Anal. Calcd for C 12H 7N 5O 4: C, 50.53; H, 2.47 and N, 24.55; found: C, 50.49; H, 2.50 and N, 24.59.
